com.socialize.api.action
Class ActionOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.socialize.api.action.ActionOptions
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShareableActionOptions, ShareOptions
public class ActionOptions
extends Object

Allows for the specification of options for sharing.

Author:
Jason Polites

isShowAuthDialog

public boolean isShowAuthDialog()
Returns true if auth is required for sharing. Defaults to socialize.require.auth

Returns:
true if auth is required for sharing.

setShowAuthDialog

public void setShowAuthDialog(boolean requireAuth)
Set to false if you DON'T want the authenticate dialog to show when sharing. Defaults to socialize.require.auth config property.

Parameters:
requireAuth -

merge

public void merge(ActionOptions other)
Used to merge legacy ActionOptions objects.

Parameters:
other - The options to be merged into this object.
